item.title: Introducing Deep Change Management, Courtesy Of AI
item.description: Deep Change Management facilitated by AI will soon become an organizational necessity for companies wishing to thrive—not survive—in the coming years.

item.title: Xbox’s Third-Party Path Seems Permanent, According To Phil Spencer
item.description: The era of Xbox that has spanned almost 25 years appears to be over and at this point it does not seem like there's any going back.

item.title: 8 Small Regions Driving Responsible Travel In 2025
item.description: Some regions - may they be lesser-known - are leading by example of responsible travel.

item.title: The Next Frontier In Data Security: How To Safeguard Sensitive Data
item.description: Traditional methods of securing data—such as perimeter defenses and endpoint antivirus—aren’t sufficient on their own, because threats now exist.

item.title: UnitedHealth Data Breach Escalates: 190 Million Americans Impacted
item.description: Your medical data is not as safe as you think. Discover how a massive ransomware attack exposed millions and the key steps to protect your privacy now...
